name: Paramnesia: Escape Together
description:
Escape Together: A Cooperative Adventure for 2-4 Players

You are members of a four-person investigation squad, ensnared in a room riddled with conspiracies. Collaborating tightly, you'll unearth clues, solve puzzles, figure out each other's real identities, and find enigmatic notes bearing your names. Decode the deepest secrets of this escape room.

Unique Exploration Areas

Every area presents its own set of challenges and mysteries.

Innovative 3D Puzzles

Navigate through a unique 3D maze that tests your wit and resolve.

Engaging Gameplay Mechanics

Experience captivating gameplay with features like endless corridor, phantom walls, intricate nesting puzzles, and characters that spring to life from paintings.

Unique Character Narratives

The four main characters each harbor their own secrets and real identities, ready for you to uncover.

Fragmented Storytelling

Embark on a journey through a narrative that spans over three centuries, presented in a series of interconnected fragments. It is your final choice that determines the divergence into distinct endings.

Perfect for fans of cooperative play and mystery-solving, this game invites you to lose yourself in a world brimming with secrets waiting to be uncovered. Whether you're escaping the clutches of evil spirits or piecing together the history of your allies, every moment is filled with suspense and intrigue.
